channel.title: CI on Jörn Ahrens
channel.description: Recent content in CI on Jörn Ahrens

item.title: A couple of scripts for Emulator in the CI system
item.description: Follow this path: Our Journey from Genymotion to the Android Emulator This contains a couple of useful scripts to automate AVD management and such.

item.title: Android Screenshot Script
item.description: Currently I'm trying a lot of automated UI testing on emulators. This could be really helpful in the near future: adb-screenshot.sh
